summary: Aon plc recently released its 2026 Climate and Catastrophe Insight report, showing that severe convective storms have overtaken tropical cyclones as the costliest insured peril of the 21st century and highlighting six straight years of global insured catastrophe losses above US$100 billion. The report underscores growing use of alternative risk transfer tools such as parametric insurance and catastrophe bonds, positioning the insurance sector as a key partner in improving climate resilience...
